H0.text: What name is given to the syndrome which involves a delusion that the affected person can transform or has transformed into an animal. Therianthropy Syndrome

H1.text: What name is given to the syndrome which involves a delusion that the affected person can transform or has transformed into an animal. Clinical Lycanthropy

H2.text: What name is given to the syndrome which involves a delusion that the affected person can transform or has transformed into an animal. Animal Identity Disorder

H3.text: What name is given to the syndrome which involves a delusion that the affected person can transform or has transformed into an animal. Zoanthropy

A4.text: Clinical lycanthropy is a rare psychiatric syndrome that involves a delusion that the affected person can transform into, has transformed into, or is a non-human animal.

A5.text: Strictly speaking, the transformation into animals in general is described as zoanthropy.

A6.text: Clinical lycanthropy, a psychiatric delusion of transforming into an animal
